column3: I think this should not be a reference, as it would make the test on line 464 always fail.\n
Huh?  The reference gets reassigned on line 463...\n

You can't change what a reference refers to. The assignment operator (except for initialization) only overwrites the value referred to. Maybe you want a pointer, which gives you control over what is referenced.\n
Right you are, thanks for telling me I'm an idiot gently.  Fixed (changed addrFound to a plain-old CAddress).\n
